ygData.subject: Re: How to know if Anthem is really working
ygData.msgSnippet: I currently use the following combo of a dragoon dirk in my primary and a pgt in my secondary.  This combo is quite effective, though I might want to try
ygData.messageBody:
I currently use the following combo of a dragoon dirk in my primary and a
pgt in my secondary. This combo is quite effective, though I might want
to try wielding a barbed leather whip in the secondary. Mostly I cannot
say enough about the dragoon dirk, it is an awesome weapon that will serve
you for quite a while.

Treilanin Loreweaver

On Tue, 20 Jul 1999, Elena Glenn wrote:

> From: "Elena Glenn" <braveheart@...>
>
> How would a combination of a tentacle whip and a Polished Granite Tomahawk
> be? I have both, and was planning on using them at level 17 for dual wield.
> Which shoud be the primary weapon, or is there a better combo? I also have
> a Dragoon Dirk. Any comments would be appreciated. Thanks
>
> Kirree
> Xegony Server
> -----Original Message-----
> From: TommyC <uber_sorcerer@...>
> To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Date: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 11:03 AM
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] How to know if Anthem is really working
>
>
> >From: "TommyC" <uber_sorcerer@...>
> >
> >I may be beating a dead horse,but.......I have been useing a mino axe for
> >the last 3 levels,singing a mix of Warsong and Anthem and hitting about
> >every 4.5 to 5 seconds. Then last nite i was given a Tenticle whip by a
> >guildmate and WOW !!!!! I was hitting about every 2 sec. in fighting a
> Giant
> >spider I was getting 3 to 4 swings to every 1 of the spiders. I must say
> >that if ye have the means(17pp) pick one up. It is a great starting weapon
> >for early teen bards!
> >Thanks for a great list keep up the good work all :-)
> >Pinen
> >Hopeless Bard of the Rathe
> >Master Brewer of the NwN
> >Bard of the 11th Song
> >
> >----- Original Message -----
> >From: John KimSent: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 1:23 PM
> >Subject: Re: [eqbards] How to know if Anthem is really working
> >
